title: Topic 004 Question 050
body: You have an on-premises application that consumes data from multiple databases. The application code references database tables by using a combination of the server, database, and table name.
You need to migrate the application data to Azure.
To which two services can you migrate the application data to achieve the goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: SQL Server on an Azure virtual machine
